column5: Seeing as how there are a few members posting about their projects I thought I would add mine. As a bunch of you are aware I was on the search for a CHEAP tinny to put on top of my tent trailer for camping trips. I ended up finding one for $200    The paint was horrible, flaking off bright red. I was going to just live with it but I couldn't. So I took her into the shop Friday afternoon and started stripping her down. This is the best part, the paint flew off with a blow gun    I got everything prepped and started goin at it. The color is the same as the tent trailer so when she goes on top it matches perfectly (almost   )  Had my son helping me (FYI - Clean blackberry lens before taking pics)    Spent about 4 hours on it Friday, 2 Saturday and 1 tonight      I wanted to turn the boat over and all I thought about was Albert's thread   . Luckily this thing is light and I had a forklift   So I hooked her at the bow, lifted it up and spun the back by hand.        I got her all finished up and loaded into my truck. She is light enough to toss around by myself which is great    Hope you enjoyed
Nice find and paint job.  Should look slick on the camper and the water!  Paul
$ 200.00 = Super deal = I'll give ya $ 300.00 bones for it right now..
Nice job on the paint! Masking the stripes is fun isn't it...
Thanks   With my labour rate it will now cost...carry the 1... $1075   Thanks, I actually really enjoy laying it out and figuring out what to do for the layout.
That will be sweet for deer creek good job and great deal.
Thanks, Trade ya for a rod   Ya I can't wait to hit there this year, I might be there more than the bay lol   Whenever you want
A little TLC for your new boat....hope it treats you good. Nice job.
I'd consider taking you up on that Dan but I already have a boat.
Sweet deal, looks like its in MUCH better shape than my piece of crap!  Haven't had time to get mine cleaned up yet. Congrats!
Looks like new with the new paint.... great job Dan Leechman
Thanks guys  As for the next project... we will see what kijiji has to offer
Great job mate!  I am looking for something like this aswell! But gonna camo it!
Trust me that came to mind!
Good work Dan. The time spent on it was well worth it.
